Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing a commission to study the feasibility of creating public/private partnerships to develop and operate job centers for immigrant day laborers.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing a commission to study the feasibility of creating public/private partnerships to develop and operate job centers for immigrant day laborers.

Items.Title: Oversight - Exercise of Prosecutorial Discretion by Immigration Authorities in New York City
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Exercise of Prosecutorial Discretion by Immigration Authorities in New York City

Items.Title: Resolution urging the United States Office of Immigration and Customs Enforcement to exercise prosecutorial discretion and decline to pursue orders of removal or to carry out removal orders in exceptional situations where deportation would cause extreme hardship to individuals themselves, family or community members and further urging restoration of discretion to immigration judges to defer deportation in exceptional cases.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: US Office of Immigration Customs Enforcement to exercise prosecutorial discretion.

Items.Title: Oversight - Exercise of Prosecutorial Discretion by Immigration Authorities in New York City
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Exercise of Prosecutorial Discretion by Immigration Authorities in New York City

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing a commission to study the feasibility of creating public/private partnerships to develop and operate job centers for immigrant day laborers.

Items.Title: Resolution urging the United States Office of Immigration and Customs Enforcement to exercise prosecutorial discretion and decline to pursue orders of removal or to carry out removal orders in exceptional situations where deportation would cause extreme hardship to individuals themselves, family or community members and further urging restoration of discretion to immigration judges to defer deportation in exceptional cases.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
